subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One question for Tony La Russa is a chapter waiting to be spoken. No wonder esteemed authors have made La Russa their go-to guy when they have an irresistible baseball itch.
snippet: One question for Tony La Russa is a chapter waiting to be spoken. No wonder esteemed authors have made La Russa their go-to guy when they have an irresistible baseball itch.
